headline: International SEO Consultant & Founder at Orainti. Maker of the SEOFOMO, AI Marketers, MarketingFOMO Newsletters and the Learningseo.io Roadmap. Sharing insights and resources about SEO, AI Search & Growth Marketing.
topSkillsByEndorsements: Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Marketing, Link Building, Keyword Research, Landing Page Optimization
about:
Aleyda is an award winning International SEO Consultant, Speaker & Author

An experienced SEO consultant specialized in International, Ecommerce, Marketplaces and SaaS SEO processes, Aleyda provides personalized & strategical SEO advice to companies worldwide, as well as training and on-going support through her boutique SEO consultancy Orainti, from where she helps from multinationals to startups across the world in competitive industries & complex environments requiring a highly personalized, in-depth & scalable approach towards organic search growth.


Aleyda is also an experienced speaker in English and Spanish (+200 events in +30 countries), and author (SEO, Las Claves Esenciales), who also offers free SEO tips in the Crawling Mondays video series, the latest SEO news in the weekly SEOFOMO newsletter (+37K subscribers), as well as AI in Marketing News with the AImarketers and in digital marketing news in the MarketingFOMO newsletter. Aleyda is also the creator behind LearningSEO.io, a reliable roadmap to learn SEO for free. 

Awarded as European Search Personality in 2018, she's also co-founder of Remoters.net, a remote work hub, featuring a free remote job board, tools, guides, and more to empower remote work.

description.text:
Aleyda is the founder of Orainti, a Results-driven SEO Consultancy helping to achieve clients' business goals worldwide.

Orainti offers highly personalized, results-driven SEO consultancy, taking into consideration the characteristics and requirements of each organization, as well as the existing competition and industry challenges, in order to offer highly actionable recommendations, validation and on-going support to achieve SEO goals, by providing:

* International and Multilingual SEO
* Ecommerce and SaaS SEO
* SEO Audits and Ongoing Processes
* Enterprise and Startup SEO Strategy
* In-House Team SEO Training
* On-demand SEO Advice
I was in charge of managing multilingual SEO projects targeting to International markets, technical SEO projects and identifying new projects opportunities coming from International based companies.

I led the SEO activities for Forex Club, coordinating the optimization processes for its international network of Websites -from the US to Russia and Europe- across remotely distributed multidisciplinary teams.

As SEO Manager at Bodaclick I was responsible to manage the SEO strategy -coordinating technical, content and link building resources and team involved- for the Bodaclick websites in 8 countries (Spain, Italy, Brazil, Mexico, Portugal, Poland, Dominican Republic and Puerto Rico) with the goal to maximize the share in the weddings online search market in these countries and increase the volume of online conversions and ROI.

updates.postText:
I'm launching a new Newsletter focused on AI for Marketing: AI Marketers ü§ñ To help you to keep up with the latest of AI in marketing! 

It will be a weekly newsletter featuring the latest AI news, guides, automations, and tools in Marketing or relevant to Marketers.

The first edition will be sent next Monday üëá Subscribe in link in comments.

üö® Announcing the #SEOFOMO News Chrome Extension! You can now stay up-to-date with SEO effortlessly without leaving your browser: 

* Easily check the latest SEO Trending Stories
* Receive Notifications of New Stories published on the SEOFOMO News Site
* Easily submit your own SEO Stories to the SEOFOMO News site 

Install it now, and start following up the latest SEO News with the #SEOFOMO News Chrome Extension. Find the link in comments.

I'm delighted to announce the¬†SEOFOMO News: Your Real-Time Source for SEO and Digital Marketing news üëáüëÄ 

‚ÄãSEOFOMO News¬†is a news community designed for SEO and digital marketing professionals to stay current with the latest industry developments in real time, created to complement the newsletter.
‚Äã
My mission with¬†SEOFOMO News¬†is to make it easier for the SEO community to follow essential updates as they happen, all in one place, without the distractions and spam of generic social media platforms. We‚Äôve designed this platform to maintain a high signal-to-noise ratio by prioritizing high-quality content and fostering insightful discussions around the industry‚Äôs most impactful stories.

In addition,¬†SEOFOMO News¬†is a space where you can not only follow up but also contribute with relevant SEO news, updates and resources you can submit, as well as engage in thoughtful discussions with other SEOs in a positive, moderated environment.

Check it out and start submitting and engaging now: https://news.seofomo.co/

Latest new üî• SEO Jobs in the Free #SEOFOMO Jobs üëá

* Head of SEO - Affiliate Marketing¬†at Legend¬†new
* SEO Product (eCommerce) Lead¬†at Holafly
* Senior SEO Consultant (full time, remote)¬†at Flow Agency 
* Polish SEO Content Specialist¬†at Holafly
* Dutch SEO Content Specialist¬†at Holafly
* English SEO Content Writer¬†at Holafly 

More üëÄ Take a look at link in comments!

üõ†Ô∏è Get Access to +13 SEO Resources in The SEOFOMO Free SEO Auditing Bundle by Subscribing to the #SEOFOMO Newsletter üëÄ Featuring: 

1. A Minimum Viable SEO Validation Checklist
2. Why my Page Doesn't Rank [Better or At All]? Fundamental SEO Diagnostics Questions
3. A Blog's SEO Configuration Checklist
4. Ecommerce Product Page Optimization Checklist

10. How to Do SEO Forecasting Using Simple ML for Sheets 
11. Latest Ranking Shifts Dashboard via GSC [Looker Studio Dashboard]
12. Extended 60 day free trial of Sitebulb, website auditing tool for professional SEOs.
13. Extended 60 day free trial of SEOTesting, SEO testing and experimentation tool. 

The best? I keep expanding it with more resources and I'll be adding a couple of more before the end of the year. 

If you haven't yet subscribed to the SEOFOMO newsletter - do it now and get it in the welcome email, subscribe now: hub(.)seofomo(.)co 

If you're already subscribed, expect a link to it in today's SEOFOMO Newsletter.

jobTitle: Creative Consultant:: Brand storytelling + Creativity + Copywriting
about:
Apasionada por las buenas historias y con m√°s de 30 a√±os de experiencia internacional, ayudo a marcas a convertir sus mensajes en narrativas aut√©nticas que conectan, inspiran y generan resultados.

Mi trayectoria se ha desarrollado en el cruce entre la publicidad, la comunicaci√≥n estrat√©gica y el marketing digital, siempre con una visi√≥n creativa y orientada a la innovaci√≥n.

He liderado proyectos como Directora Creativa en McCann Erickson (Madrid) y trabajado como Copywriter en Conill Saatchi & Saatchi (Los √Ångeles). Desde hace a√±os, ejerzo como consultora creativa independiente, colaborando con clientes en Reino Unido, Italia, M√©xico, Israel y Espa√±a, adaptando cada mensaje al contexto, la audiencia y los objetivos del negocio.

Hoy combino mi experiencia profesional con la formaci√≥n: dirijo el Curso de Copywriting con IA en KSchool, soy profesora en Domestika y otras instituciones.

Adem√°s, soy autora del libro "Storytelling y Copywriting: C√≥mo contar la historia de tu empresa" (Ed. Anaya), una gu√≠a pr√°ctica para marcas que quieren comunicar con emoci√≥n, claridad y prop√≥sito en un entorno digital en constante evoluci√≥n.


üß© Especialidades:

Saluden a #copywriting con IA, mi nuevo libro.

Chau, sentirte como actriz o actor de reparto en tu propia vida.
Chau, quedarte en blanco cuando intentas expresar tus ideas.
Chau, extra√±ar c√≥mo eras: divertido, aut√©ntico, ese "t√∫" guay de antes.
Chau, proyectos que postergas eternamente.
Chau, esa sensaci√≥n de "un d√≠a lo har√©"‚Ä¶ y ese d√≠a que nunca llega.  
Bueno, s√≠. ¬°Ese d√≠a llega!

El Legado experience embraces a combination of the Glenfiddich brand essence, William Grant¬¥s vision, and honors all his family efforts to share their creations throughout the years.

With that as starting point, we wanted to create an experience simple but powerful, that could be enjoyed in any other country at any given moment, no matter the cultural background nor the whisky expertise the client of the bar has. So we went to the basics, searching for the most common things that a human being has: his and her emotions.

So from that moment on, inspired by the story of William Grant and all his achievements, we came up with an experience and a cocktail that bring up all the Glenfiddich 12 nuances. The result is a unique way to enjoy the world‚Äôs most awarded whisky even before you see it or taste it.

honorsAndAwards.title: Glenfiddich World¬¥s Most Experimental Bartender - Espa√±a 2018
honorsAndAwards.subtitle: Issued by Glenfiddich, William Grant & Sons Group ¬∑ Jun 2018

description.text:
Competici√≥n internacional que busca encontrar nuevas formas para consumir whisky. En este caso, junto al reconocido barman espa√±ol David Manzano, creamos una experiencia sensorial alrededor de un cocktail elaborado con Glenfiddich 12, en el que intervienen los sabores y las sensaciones.

Recientemente hemos sido seleccionados como los mejores y m√°s innovadores de Espa√±a. En noviembre, disputaremos la final internacional.

description.text:
¬øQu√© es el brand storytelling y para qu√© sirve? ¬øC√≥mo se dise√±a una estrategia de storytelling? ¬øC√≥mo hago para que todo tenga sentido en los textos? ¬øC√≥mo encontrar el tono de voz de mi marca? ¬øC√≥mo hago para que el copywriting realmente represente todo lo que mi marca es? ¬øC√≥mo hago para trasladar todo el ADN de mi marca en dispositivos de voz?

Encuentra todas estas respuestas en el libro Storytelling y Copywriting que acaba de lanzar Editorial Anaya. M√°s de 300 p√°ginas con conocimientos, plantillas y consejos para marcas grandes que no quieren ser peque√±as. Y empresas peque√±as que quieren ser grandes.

publications.title: En el d√≠a del reino del ‚Äúun ratito m√°s‚Äù, de brunch en Barcelona.
publications.subtitle: Loff.it ¬∑ Mar 1, 2017

description.text:
Brunch en hoteles, de los flexivegetarianos hasta los m√°s tropicales. Y brunchs exclusivos, tambi√©n.

Que no, que no suene la alarma. Pero el d√≠a del reino del ‚Äúun ratito m√°s‚Äù est√° a punto de empezar (a la hora que decidas que sea eso) y lo hace para arrasar con un domingo de brunch en Barcelona.

El cuerpo te pide ‚Äúcaf√© con algo‚Äù y no, aqu√≠ hay caf√© y todo. Desde las opciones extra ‚Äúhealthy‚Äù hasta las que combinan las nuevas tendencias culinarias. Que s√≠, que las tradicionales est√°n. Pero un brunch en el s√©ptimo d√≠a tambi√©n tiene hueco para un momento enigm√°tico y exclusivo.

Porque si lo que te apetece es una escapada a la ciudad condal o pasar una noche especial en alguno de sus hoteles, el brunch en estos complejos con estrellas incluidas, puede ser una muy buen elecci√≥n.

Sunne ES podcasts. Desde su concepci√≥n y asesoramiento, hasta la distribuci√≥n. Se conoce cada recoveco del proceso, lo domina y siempre est√° abierto a probar algo que no se ha hecho hasta el momento.

updates.postText:
Os traigo otra noticia que me emociona much√≠simo: 

Casi coincidiendo con la fecha del #GAAD (Global Accessibility Awareness Day) de este a√±o, os puedo anunciar la publicaci√≥n de mi primer curso de LinkedIn Learning. 

S√≠! Me estreno como instructora de LinkedIn Learning!

Y no puedo compartir esto, sin agradecer enormemente la confianza y la oportunidad a Carlos Burges, a Sergio R.-Sol√≠s, por seguir apostando por m√≠, cuando ni yo misma lo hac√≠a. Y a mi querida Gisele,¬†por su acompa√±amiento, motivaci√≥n y paciencia. Gracias!¬†

Puedes acceder gratis a mi curso en el siguiente enlace. #DerechoDeLaUni√≥nEuropea #EAA #LeyEuropeaDeAccesibilidad #DirectivaEuropeaDeAccesibilidad #A11y

Me hace especial ilusi√≥n, participar en las charlas del #ModernWebUOC, de las que tantos a√±os fui seguidora.
El pr√≥ximo martes 27, intentar√© que mi exposici√≥n sobre c√≥mo implementar la cultura de la accesibilidad en las organizaciones, os resulte interesante.
Gracias, C√©sar, por la oportunidad.

Ayer fue una tarde fant√°stica en Aticco. Mi charla en Friends of Figma Barcelona fue un llamamiento a la revoluci√≥n y aqu√≠, Isabel Corral ha escrito un fant√°stico resumen.
Recordad: que no os la cuelen. Una persona sola, no puede solucionar los problemas de accesibilidad. Eso, es un fracaso seguro.
La accesibilidad es responsabilidad de toda la organizaci√≥n.
Gracias por una tarde genial! üíú
